t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites

t: New To Brand Metrics
s: Thanks for the post. Brand Metrics help quantify opportunities for your brand at each stage of the customer journey on Amazon. They allow brands to understand the value of different shopping engagements that impact stages of that journey. You may view Brand Metrics in the Amazon Advertising console.

t: Acquire new customers with new-to-brand metrics for Amazon Attribution
s: Amazon Attribution allows you to understand whether your own marketing channels and campaigns lead to a sale in the Amazon store. The new-to-brand metrics show whether a purchase for your brand’s product on Amazon was made by an existing customer or a new buyer.
